page.title: 10Transport cont
page.content: This ferry only operates between the hours of 08.30 and 17.45,carrying passengers towork,holidaymakers sightseeing,and day shoppers to Falmouth for goods they cannot buy in their own area.Unfortunately on days when the weather is very bad the ferry does not operate and this can cause problems for regular passengers on theit way to work,forcing them to make other arrangements,causing inconvenience and a much longer costly journey.{ {Coach Services.} A private coach company operates a limited service on three days a week. On other days there are no coaches running to or from the area.This service consists of one bus a day travelling to and from Truro or St.Austell to this area.There are however two services on a friday. {pto
